if indeed <S%G1512><s%> you have tasted <S%G1089><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> is gracious: <S%G5543><s%>

For you <S%G5213><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> believe <S%G4100><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> is the honor, <S%G5092><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> for those who are disobedient, <S%G544><s%> "The stone <S%G3037><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> the builders <S%G3618><s%> rejected, <S%G593><s%> <S%G3778><s%> has <S%G1519><s%> become <S%G1096><s%> the chief <S%G2776><s%> cornerstone, <S%G1137><s%>"

and, <S%G2532><s%> "a stone <S%G3037><s%> of stumbling, <S%G4348><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> a rock <S%G4073><s%> of offense. <S%G4625><s%>" For they <S%G3739><s%> stumble <S%G4350><s%> at the word, <S%G3056><s%> being disobedient, <S%G544><s%> to which <S%G1519><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> they were appointed. <S%G5087><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> you <S%G5210><s%> are a chosen <S%G1588><s%> race, <S%G1085><s%> a royal <S%G934><s%> priesthood, <S%G2406><s%> a holy <S%G40><s%> nation, <S%G1484><s%> a <S%G1519><s%> people <S%G2992><s%> for God <S%G4047><s%>'s own possession, that <S%G3704><s%> you may proclaim <S%G1804><s%> the excellence <S%G703><s%> of him who called <S%G2564><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> darkness <S%G4655><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> his <S%G846><s%> marvelous <S%G2298><s%> light: <S%G5457><s%>

who <S%G3588><s%> in time past <S%G4218><s%> were no <S%G3756><s%> people, <S%G2992><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> are God <S%G2316><s%>'s people, <S%G2992><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> had <S%G1653><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> obtained mercy, <S%G1653><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> have obtained mercy. <S%G1653><s%>

Beloved, <S%G27><s%> I beg <S%G3870><s%> you as <S%G5613><s%> foreigners <S%G3941><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> pilgrims, <S%G3927><s%> to abstain <S%G567><s%> from fleshly <S%G4559><s%> lusts, <S%G1939><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> war <S%G4754><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> the soul; <S%G5590><s%>

having <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5216><s%> good <S%G2570><s%> behavior <S%G391><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> the nations, <S%G1484><s%> so in that <S%G2443><s%> of <S%G1722><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> they speak against <S%G2635><s%> you <S%G5216><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> evildoers, <S%G2555><s%> they may <S%G1392><s%> by <S%G1537><s%> your good <S%G2570><s%> works, <S%G2041><s%> which they see, <S%G2029><s%> glorify <S%G1392><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the day <S%G2250><s%> of visitation. <S%G1984><s%>

Therefore subject <S%G5293><s%> yourselves to every <S%G3956><s%> ordinance <S%G2937><s%> of man <S%G442><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%>'s sake: whether <S%G1535><s%> to the king, <S%G935><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> supreme; <S%G5242><s%>

or <S%G1535><s%> to governors, <S%G2232><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> sent <S%G3992><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> him <S%G846><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> vengeance <S%G1557><s%> on evildoers <S%G2555><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> for praise <S%G1868><s%> to those who do well. <S%G17><s%>

For <S%G3754><s%> this <S%G3779><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the will <S%G2307><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> that by well-doing <S%G15><s%> you should put to silence <S%G5392><s%> the ignorance <S%G56><s%> of foolish <S%G878><s%> men: <S%G444><s%>

as <S%G5613><s%> free, <S%G1658><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> using <S%G2192><s%> your freedom <S%G1657><s%> for <S%G5613><s%> a cloak <S%G1942><s%> of wickedness, <S%G2549><s%> but <S%G235><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> bondservants <S%G1401><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>
Honor <S%G5091><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> men. <S%G25><s%> Love the brotherhood. <S%G81><s%> Fear <S%G5399><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%> Honor <S%G5091><s%> the king. <S%G935><s%>

Servants, <S%G3610><s%> be in subjection <S%G5293><s%> to <S%G1203><s%> your masters <S%G1203><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> fear; <S%G5401><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> only <S%G3440><s%> to the good <S%G18><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> gentle, <S%G1933><s%> but <S%G235><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> to the wicked. <S%G4646><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> it <S%G5124><s%> is commendable <S%G5485><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> someone <S%G5100><s%> endures <S%G5297><s%> pain, <S%G3077><s%> suffering <S%G3958><s%> unjustly, <S%G95><s%> because of <S%G1223><s%> conscience <S%G4893><s%> toward God. <S%G2316><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> what <S%G4169><s%> glory <S%G2811><s%> is it if, <S%G1487><s%> when <S%G2532><s%> you sin, <S%G264><s%> you patiently <S%G5278><s%> endure beating? <S%G2852><s%> But <S%G235><s%> if, <S%G1487><s%> when you do well, <S%G15><s%> <S%G2532><s%> you patiently <S%G5278><s%> endure suffering, <S%G3958><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> is commendable <S%G5485><s%> with <S%G3844><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> you were called, <S%G2564><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> suffered <S%G3958><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> us, <S%G2257><s%> leaving <S%G5277><s%> you <S%G2254><s%> an example, <S%G5261><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> you should follow <S%G1872><s%> his <S%G846><s%> steps, <S%G2487><s%>

who <S%G3739><s%> did <S%G4160><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> sin, <S%G266><s%> "neither <S%G3761><s%> was <S%G2147><s%> deceit <S%G1388><s%> found <S%G2147><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> his <S%G846><s%> mouth. <S%G4750><s%>"

who <S%G3739><s%> his own <S%G846><s%> self <S%G846><s%> bore <S%G399><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> sins <S%G266><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> his body <S%G4983><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the tree, <S%G3586><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> we, <S%G2198><s%> having died <S%G581><s%> to sins, <S%G266><s%> might live <S%G2198><s%> to righteousness; <S%G1343><s%> by <S%G3739><s%> whose <S%G846><s%> stripes <S%G3468><s%> you were healed. <S%G2390><s%>
